messages.msgSnippet: There have been a rise in the number of violent crimes, particularly serial murders, etc., since the advent of the shrink excuse system. Lynda ... From: Julie
messages.messageBody:
There have been a rise in the number of violent crimes, particularly serial
murders, etc., since the advent of the shrink excuse system.

Lynda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1957
messages.msgSnippet: But is it truly an increase in this type of behavior or do we just know about it
messages.messageBody:
<<things like the guy in Ireland who killed a woman by gluing her mouth
shut>>

But is it truly an increase in this type of behavior or do we just know
about it now? Example: 60 years ago, the newspapers wouldn't have reported
about the guy all the way over in Ireland. We wouldn't have heard about the
little girl kidnapped on the other end of the country, etc..

Julie
